review_text: I was trying to closeout my Mother's account - she passed away. I have gone back three times because the information I received was incomplete and unclear. It was a different document need each time. Also they failed to return two of my calls. Horrible customer service.
They wanted $7 to cash their own $25 check someone wrote me. Glad I don't have an account here.

I was at Citisens for a student refinance application. It seemed everything was fine and the application was complete. They had asked for a few more files which was normal. After all said and done, it got denied because nobody told me that I could not refinance under the pay as your earn repayment plan. I was heavily mislead and even opened and account with Citizens. I should have been told up front (not in fine print) all things that could keep me from being approved. I called up and they said their policy is that I need to be in standard repayment for 3 months, but will only hold my application for 90 days, making that physically impossible. Why would you even have that policy? I find I very unprofessional and will continue to give Citizens negative reviews due to being completely 100% mislead.
